com.handmark.pulltorefresh.library

接口 PullToRefreshBase.OnPullEventListener<V extends android.view.View>

  • 所有已知实现类:
    SoundPullEventListener
    封闭类:
    PullToRefreshBase<T extends android.view.View>

    public static interface PullToRefreshBase.OnPullEventListener<V extends android.view.View>
    Listener that allows you to be notified when the user has started or finished a touch event. Useful when you want to append extra UI events (such as sounds). See ( PullToRefreshBase.setOnPullEventListener(com.handmark.pulltorefresh.library.PullToRefreshBase.OnPullEventListener<T>).
    作者:
    Chris Banes

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void onPullEvent(PullToRefreshBase<V> refreshView, PullToRefreshBase.State state, PullToRefreshBase.Mode direction)
      Called when the internal state has been changed, usually by the user pulling.

    • 方法详细资料

      • onPullEvent

        void onPullEvent(PullToRefreshBase<V> refreshView,
               PullToRefreshBase.State state,
               PullToRefreshBase.Mode direction)
        Called when the internal state has been changed, usually by the user pulling.
        参数:
        refreshView - - View which has had it's state change.
        state - - The new state of View.
        direction - - One of PullToRefreshBase.Mode.PULL_FROM_START or PullToRefreshBase.Mode.PULL_FROM_END depending on which direction the user is pulling. Only useful when state is PullToRefreshBase.State.PULL_TO_REFRESH or PullToRefreshBase.State.RELEASE_TO_REFRESH.
